languages.text: "Могу ли я надеяться, что ты позволишь мне вновь опереться на твое плечо, элантах? И отправишься со мной к далеким звездам Кетца... Темера..." {n}, — человеческая речь с трудом поддается взволнованной эльдарке, -{/n} "Чтобы спасти моих собратьев от гнева твоего могучего соперника?"

traits.locale_text: "Могу ли я надеяться, что ты позволишь мне вновь опереться на твое плечо, элантах? И отправишься со мной к далеким звездам Кетца... Темера..." {n}, — человеческая речь с трудом поддается взволнованной эльдарке, -{/n} "Чтобы спасти моих собратьев от гнева твоего могучего соперника?"

languages.text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"
languages.original_text: "Могу ли я надеяться, что ты позволишь мне вновь опереться на твое плечо, элантах? И отправишься со мной к далеким звездам Кетца... Темера..." {n}, — человеческая речь с трудом поддается взволнованной эльдарке, -{/n} "Чтобы спасти моих собратьев от гнева твоего могучего соперника?"

traits.locale_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kinspeople from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

"Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kinspeople from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

"Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kinspeople from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

"Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kinspeople from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

"Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

"Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

languages.text: “你愿意再次借给我可以依靠的臂膀吗，外界人？你愿意与我一起前往遥远的……格扎尔……特默吗？”{n}伊莉耶特激动不已，结结巴巴地说着人类的语言。{/n}“你愿意从强大对手的怒火之中，拯救我的同胞吗？”
languages.original_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

traits.locale_text: “你愿意再次借给我可以依靠的臂膀吗，外界人？你愿意与我一起前往遥远的……格扎尔……特默吗？”{n}伊莉耶特激动不已，结结巴巴地说着人类的语言。{/n}“你愿意从你强大的对手的怒火之中，拯救我的同胞吗？”

languages.text: "Darf ich zu hoffen wagen, dass ... ich mich wieder an Eurer Schulter anlehnen darf, Elantach? Begleitet Ihr mich zu den fernen Sternen von Quetza ... Temer?" {n}Vor Aufregung hat die Aeldari Mühe mit der menschlichen Sprache.{/n} "Um meine Verwandten vor dem Zorn Eures mächtigen Rivalen zu retten?"
languages.original_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

traits.locale_text: "Darf ich zu hoffen wagen, dass ... ich mich wieder an Eurer Schulter anlehnen darf, Elantach? Begleitet Ihr mich zu den fernen Sternen von Quetza ... Temer?" {n}Vor Aufregung hat die Aeldari Mühe mit der menschlichen Sprache.{/n} "Um meine Verwandten vor dem Zorn Eures mächtigen Rivalen zu retten?"

languages.text: «¿Puedo atreverme a confiar en que me prestes un hombro sobre el que apoyarme, elantach? ¿Vendrás conmigo a las remotas estrellas de Quetza... Temer?». {n}En su agitación, la lengua de la Aeldari se traba con el idioma humano.{/n} «¿Para salvar a los míos de la cólera de tu formidable rival?».
languages.original_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Puedo atreverme a confiar en que me prestes un hombro sobre el que apoyarme, elantach? ¿Vendrás conmigo a las remotas estrellas de Quetza... Temer?». {n}En su agitación, la lengua de la Aeldari se traba con el idioma humano.{/n} «¿Para salvar a los míos de la cólera de tu formidable rival?».

languages.text: « Puis-je espérer que vous m'apporterez une fois encore votre soutien, elantach ? Voulez-vous bien m'accompagner jusqu'aux étoiles lointaines de Quetza... Temer ? » {n}Agitée, l'Aeldari a du mal à parler la langue des humains.{/n} « Pour sauver mes semblables de la colère de votre puissant rival ? »
languages.original_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

traits.locale_text: « Puis-je espérer que vous m'apporterez une fois encore votre soutien, elantach ? Voulez-vous bien m'accompagner jusqu'aux étoiles lointaines de Quetza... Temer ? » {n}Agitée, l'Aeldari a du mal à parler la langue des humains.{/n} « Pour sauver mes semblables de la colère de votre puissant rival ? »

languages.text: 「エランタ、私はあなたがまた肩を貸してくれるだろうと図々しくも願っている。私と一緒に遠いケツァ・テメルの星まで来てくれないだろうか？{n}興奮のあまり、アエルダリは人間の言葉に悪戦苦闘している。{/n}「あなたの強大な宿敵の怒りから、私の同胞を救うために」
languages.original_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、私はあなたがまた肩を貸してくれるだろうと図々しくも願っている。私と一緒に遠いケツァ・テメルの星まで来てくれないだろうか？{n}興奮のあまり、アエルダリは人間の言葉に悪戦苦闘している。{/n}「あなたの強大な宿敵の怒りから、私の同胞を救うために」

languages.text: "Bana yeniden güvenebileceğim bir omuz olacak mısın elantach? Benimle Quetza... Temer'in uzak yıldızlarına gelecek misin?" {n}Aeldari, heyecandan insan dilini konuşmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "Soyumu güçlü rakibinin gazabından koruyacak mısın?"
languages.original_text: "Dare I hope that you will lend me a shoulder to lean on again, elantach? Will you come with me to the distant stars of Quetza... Temer?" {n}In her agitation, the Aeldari is struggling with human language.{/n} "To save my kin from the wrath of your mighty rival?"

traits.locale_text: "Bana yeniden güvenebileceğim bir omuz olacak mısın elantach? Benimle Quetza... Temer'in uzak yıldızlarına gelecek misin?" {n}Aeldari, heyecandan insan dilini konuşmakta zorlanıyor.{/n} "Soyumu güçlü rakibinin gazabından koruyacak mısın?"
